title: A CFD Study on the Effect of Portable Air Cleaner Placement on Airborne Infection Control in a Classroom
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00114A, Paper
Gen Pei, Parham Azimi, Donghyun Rim, Joseph Allen
The utilization of portable air cleaners (PACs) is a recommended supplemental approach to help remove airborne pathogens and mitigate disease transmission in learning environments. To improve PAC effectiveness, science-based information...
